item.title: Ipsum

MakeUP 美咔 ** An IoT solution to improving cosmetics managing experience** **
Overview Brief Introduction MakeUP is an IoT solution which includes hardware product and a Wechat Mini Program, aiming at improving the user experience of managing cosmetics and skin-care products. It tries to solve the pain points and create fluent experience when users sort out, manage and buy cosmetics. It is a course project of Design of Information Product, taught by Prof.
